resources.string: Allow ROOT to start Brevent server without \"USB Debugging\"\n\nRequires 4 Brefoil in total

Please pay total 4 Brefoil to use "Run as ROOT".

If you have paid, please disable Xposed, launch Alipay, tap Records, it should be recognized automatically.

If it cannot be recognized, or paid via non Alipay, please send Email with screenshots of payment details.

Emails will be replied in 24 hours normally, please verify payment by yourself if you can.
